about_hello: Hello, I am Wagner Br√ºggemann, a Backend Developer with over 4 years of experience. With a strong focus on development, I combine high-performance code with the best industry practices.
java_specialist: I am specialized in Java applications within a Spring environment, with a focus on clean architecture. My adaptability to different scenarios and technical expertise allow me to turn ideas into reality.
sansys_responsibilities_projects_section: Development of integrations between systems and batch processing.
Creation of solutions for generating accounting files and implementing accounting rules.
Analysis and resolution of inconsistencies in accounting entries and reports.
Development of distributed systems for revenue qualification.
Support in adopting agile methodologies and team management, including allocation, estimation, and client support.
sansys_team_role_sections_0: Member of the accounting system team, focusing on code and process correction and improvements.
sansys_main_contributions_sections_0: Full participation in the architecture of microservices for revenue qualification, accounting entries, and integrations with the e-Sfinge systems of the government of Santa Catarina.
sansys_main_contributions_sections_1: Implementation of agile rituals in the accounting development team.
sansys_main_contributions_sections_2: Full participation in defining project documentation for the accounting team.
sansys_about_veolia_sections_0: French multinational leader in environmental resource management, present in Brazil.
sansys_about_veolia_sections_1: Offers sustainable solutions in water, waste, and energy, with a focus on circular economy.
sansys_about_veolia_sections_2: Develops water reuse and infrastructure projects, such as mobile water treatment.
sansys_about_jtech_sections_0: Brazilian company, subsidiary of Veolia, specialized in digital solutions for sanitation.
sansys_about_jtech_sections_1: Develops commercial and operational management systems for utilities.
sansys_about_jtech_sections_2: Provides apps for consumers to check bills and make payments remotely.
sansys_about_sansys_sections_0: Jtech system to optimize the management of sanitation services.
sansys_about_sansys_sections_1: Integrates consumption reading, billing, irregularity control, and customer service.
sansys_about_sansys_sections_2: Facilitates efficient management and integration with digital channels.
